reviews.review: Com minhas 200 horas de experiência,  e minha sabedoria em jogos de matar pessoas de outras cores, posso discorrer sobre tal assunto sem ter desconhecimento sobre o jogo, bom, bom para quem? Para quem joga tá ok

This game is part of my childhood. I have hundreds of hours played in it. It was a great game for him, but you have a few downsides to it. The graphics, the sound, the gameplay are old, yet it still evokes memories when it comes to this game.

del 2012 jugando esta maravilla de cs y cs go gran logia

for a 22 year old game, it plays, runs and looks great. Online matchmaking is amazing since it consists of purely a server browser, that surprisingly holds up strong 22 years after it's initial release. Game is tiny aswell, <2 GB if I recall correctly. It's worth playing if you're into early 00s FPS or just want that feel of pre-millenial nostalgia. And if anyone wants to team, hmu hehe

przepis na bigos:

500 g mięsa wieprzowego (np. karkówki)
200 g kiełbasy
1 cebula
2 łyżki oleju roślinnego
3 szklanki bulionu lub wody
30 g suszonych borowików
2 łyżki powideł śliwkowych lub kilka suszonych śliwek
1 jabłko (np. reneta lub antonówka) - opcjonalnie
1 kg kiszonej kapusty
1 łyżka koncentratu pomidorowego
1 łyżka mąki
1 łyżka masła
Устаревшая скукота, в которую наиграешь максимум 2 часика и перестанешь. Не понимаю почему эту игру до сихпор хвалят до уровня шедевральной игры.
